name: Neon the Ninja
description: NEON THE NINJA is a punk rock platformer where you hide in plain sight and bring swords to the gun fight. Slay each boss and take their power if you donâ€™t smash your controller first! Are You Ninja Enough?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Duo or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Xbox controller highly recommended. Other controllers may work by remapping input settings in the launcher and/or using a third party solution.
